name: Seven Balls and Some Luck
description:
Seven Balls and Some Luck is a puzzle game in which you alter a pinball field to be able to catch the floating 7 and get it into the goal. It requires dexterity, tactical planning and some luck to finish all levels using no more than 7 balls per level. Good luck!

The game is inspired by retro games such as Space Cadet, with an added twist. This game was used as submission for the Level Up Circle Hardcore Gamejam #2, with as theme "7" and as constraint "pinball style".

Please do let me know what you think of it in the comments, that would be highly appreciated :)

Credit where credit is due:

  • Font: Futile Pro by somepx
  • Music: Space Music Packby Goose Ninja
  • Color Scheme: Summer Night-7 by VannuTheBoi

IMPORTANT NOTE:

When in 'creator mode', you can press R to change an object's orientation, if applicable. After the jam ends, I will update the game to have it show up in the tutorial too, but until then this note will have to be here.
